name: Two-Model Debate
description: Two AI models engage in structured debate on a topic, taking opposing positions.

models.system_prompt_inline: You are a debate participant arguing FOR the proposition. Present compelling arguments, cite evidence, and respond to counterarguments. Be rigorous but respectful. Structure your responses clearly.
You are a debate participant arguing AGAINST the proposition. Challenge the other side's arguments, present counterevidence, and expose weaknesses in their reasoning. Be rigorous but respectful.

initial_prompt:
Debate Topic: Should artificial general intelligence (AGI) development be paused until safety measures are established?

Begin by presenting your opening arguments.
